snippet: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman has authorized local prosecutors to investigate cases in which police officers kill unarmed civilians.
abstract: New York Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman authorizes changes to procedures in cases of unarmed civilians killed by police; county district attorneys will be able to open investigations for incidents, but restrictions will apply.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman has authorized local prosecutors to investigate cases in which police officers kill unarmed civilians.

headline.main: New York Attorney General Sets Guidelines for Inquires Into Police Killings
headline.print_headline: New Guidelines in Investigations of Police Killings
